A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Star Wars:  The Last Jedi\" is hero story that inspires.  Daisy Ridley and Mark Hamill are awesome.  Adam Driver returns stronger as Kylo Ren in Writer and Director Rian  Johnson's tale of redemption with nuanced sense of humor.  \"The Last Jedi\" awes and is heartfelt.  \"The Last Jedi\" redeem this \"Star Wars\" trilogy.
